actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Army to convey to the Board of Regents of the University System of Georgia certain lands of the United States in Augusta, Ga.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to convey title from the United States to the Board of Regents of the University of Georgia in a specified parcel of land located in Augusta, Georgia. Conditions the sale of the land on the payment of $662,000 or the fair market value, whichever is greater. Makes available the moneys received by this sale for the construction of a United States Army Reserve Training Center.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Army to convey to the Board of Regents of the University System of Georgia certain lands of the United States in Augusta, Ga.
